events.name: change
events.description: Fires at the end of a knob's adjustment and offers the value of the model

events.name: drag-value
events.description: The value of the model while dragging is still in progress

model-value.desc: Any number to indicate the given value of the knob. Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use the v-model directive

min.description: The minimum value that the model (the knob value) should start at

max.description: The maximum value that the model (the knob value) should go to

inner-min.description: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

inner-max.description: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

step.description: A number representing steps in the value of the model, while adjusting the knob

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

center-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
center-color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

track-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
track-color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

font-size.description: Size of text in CSS units, including unit name. Suggestion: use 'em' units to sync with component size

thickness.description: Thickness of progress arc as a ratio (0.0 < x < 1.0) of component size

angle.description: Angle to rotate progress arc by

show-value.description: Enables the default slot and uses it (if available), otherwise it displays the 'value' prop as text; Make sure the text has enough space to be displayed inside the component
